title: Textile, ca. 1780
medium:
Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: block printed on plain weave
description: Heavyweight fragment in a small allover design of leaf and bud clusters. Ground in red picotage. Leaf with a green center and leaves in red and dark brown. Buds are yellow rising from small mounds of red and blue.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1780.
ca. 1780. Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: block printed on plain weave. Gift of Harold M. Bailey. 1960-79-3.
